common.title: PC Configurator
common.Text: Modern PC configuration platform for custom and ready-made computers.

nav.Name: Build Or Choose Your Dream PC
nav.Info: Custom configurations, expert advice, and premium components for gamers, creators, and professionals.
nav.Answer: We provide end-to-end service for all your PC needs, from configuration to delivery and support.
nav.Text1: Create your dream PC with our easy-to-use configurator. Choose from premium components that match your needs and budget.
nav.Text2: Every configuration is reviewed by our specialists to ensure compatibility and optimal performance.
nav.Text3: We use only high-quality, tested components from trusted manufacturers with full warranty coverage.
nav.Text4: Our expert team is available to help you with any questions or issues, before and after your purchase.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are a company specializing in high-quality PC configurations and custom solution building.
about.storyParagraph1: IvaPro started in 2020 with a mission to fill a gap in Latvia's computer market. We believed everyone should have access to custom, quality computers at a fair price.
about.storyParagraph2: The company grew rapidly thanks to our loyal customers and commitment to offering only the best. Becoming the leading PC configuration specialist in Latvia, we constantly improve our product and service range.
about.storyParagraph3: Today, IvaPro has become a name trusted by professionals, gamers, and tech enthusiasts across the Baltics. We take pride in our ability to combine cutting-edge components with the best customer service.
about.qualityText: We use only the highest quality components and rigorously test every computer we release.
about.expertiseText: Our team consists of experienced specialists who keep up with the latest trends and technologies.
about.satisfactionText: Our main goal is customer satisfaction. We always go the extra mile to ensure excellent service.
about.ctaTitle: Ready to start your IvaPro journey?
about.ctaText: Whether you want to build a powerful gaming PC or a reliable system for work, we can help.

team.name: John Smith
team.bio: John has over 15 years of experience in the IT industry. He founded IvaPro with the goal of making quality PC configurations accessible to everyone.

team.name: Anna Johnson
team.bio: Anna is a tech enthusiast with excellent hardware knowledge. She leads our technical team and reviews all configurations.

team.name: Michael Brown
team.bio: Michael ensures every customer receives excellent service. His team is ready to help with any questions or issues.

team.name: Sarah Williams
team.bio: Sarah is responsible for our brand visibility. Her creativity and strategic thinking help IvaPro reach new customers.

milestones.title: Growing in Latvia
milestones.description: Opened additional stores in major Latvian cities.

milestones.title: Baltic Market Leader
milestones.description: Became the leading PC builder in all Baltic countries.

milestones.title: European Expansion
milestones.description: Plan to expand to Central and Northern Europe.

repairs.title: Computer Repair Services
repairs.subtitle: Professional repair services for your PC, laptop, and peripherals. Fast, reliable, and affordable.
repairs.expertText: Having issues with your computer? Our team of certified technicians can help! We offer a wide range of repair services for all types of computers, from basic troubleshooting to complex hardware repairs.
repairs.diagnosticsDesc: Complete computer diagnostics to identify hardware and software issues.
repairs.hardwareDesc: Professional replacement of damaged or failing hardware components.
repairs.dataRecoveryDesc: Recovery of lost, deleted, or corrupted data from storage devices.
repairs.virusRemovalDesc: Removal of viruses, malware, and other threats from your computer.
repairs.screenRepairDesc: Repair of cracked, broken, or malfunctioning displays.
repairs.optimizationDesc: Speed up your computer by optimizing software and hardware settings.
repairs.certifiedDesc: Our repairs are performed by certified professionals with years of experience.
repairs.warrantyDesc: All our repair services come with a warranty for your peace of mind.
repairs.turnaroundDesc: We aim to complete most repairs within 24-48 hours.
repairs.pricingDesc: No hidden fees. You'll always know the full price before we start.
repairs.faqTimeQuestion: How long do repairs usually take?
repairs.faqTimeAnswer: Most repairs are completed within 24-48 hours, depending on the issue and availability of parts. We'll provide an estimated timeline when you bring in your device.
repairs.faqWarrantyQuestion: Do you offer a warranty on repairs?
repairs.faqWarrantyAnswer: Yes, all our repairs come with a 90-day warranty on parts and labor. If the same issue occurs within this period, we'll fix it at no additional cost.
repairs.faqCantFixQuestion: What if you can't fix my computer?
repairs.faqCantFixAnswer: If we're unable to fix your computer, you'll only be charged for the diagnostic fee. We'll provide recommendations for your next steps, which might include replacement options.
repairs.faqAppointmentQuestion: Do I need to make an appointment?
repairs.faqAppointmentAnswer: While walk-ins are welcome, we recommend making an appointment to ensure faster service. You can book online or call us to schedule a convenient time.
repairs.readyToFix: Ready to Get Your Device Fixed?
repairs.readyToFixText: Don't let computer problems slow you down. Our expert technicians are ready to help you get your device running smoothly again.
